title: Know The Colour Of Your Uber Before You Get Picked Up
text:
Know The Colour Of Your Uber Before You Get Picked Up February 23, 2017 Posted by Krshna Prashant 
You know that awkward moment when you get into the wrong Uber? Or when both of you reach for the same door handle – only to realise that this is their car, not yours? We hear you. 
That’s why, we’re making it a lot easier for you to recognise your ride when it’s approaching. 
Now, once you’ve requested a ride, the colour of your car icon in the app will match your driver’s car. You’ll be able to see this from within the app itself – on the map. 
Coloured car icons can help riders recognise their Uber rides even before they’re picked up. We already share the driver’s name, photo, vehicle make and model, a license plate in the app, and are excited to add another tool to help riders identify their Uber. 
We’re doing this to improve the pickup experience based on feedback from riders and driver-partners. When riders and drivers can easily find each other, we’re able to trim down wait times, which is a win for everyone! This is just the kind of smart innovation that keeps Singapore moving forward. 
Try requesting a ride today – which car colour will you be matched with? Sign up to ride or drive
